thread.title: ILY Enterprise, Inc Introduces the New HD Mini Hard Disk Drive (HDD) Duplicator

author: PR.com
title: ILY Enterprise, Inc Introduces the New HD Mini Hard Disk Drive (HDD) Duplicator
text:
ILY Enterprise, Inc Introduces the New HD Mini Hard Disk Drive (HDD) Duplicator
ILY Enterprise, Inc introduces the new HD Mini Hard Disk Drive (HDD) Duplicator, which can copy two HDDs or SSDs.
City of Industry, CA, August 28, 2015 --( PR.com )-- ILY Enterprise, Inc is proud to announce the release of new HD Mini HDD Duplicator. HD Mini is a slim and ultimate lightweight HDD duplicator for mobile usage. No matter indoors, outdoors, or travelling, you can duplicator hard disk drive anywhere anytime without interruption It is not necessary to dissemble a HDD from computer for duplication with HD Mini, simply connect the HD Mini to the HDD inside the computer with cable and one or two blank HDDs for data backup. HD Mini gives you more flexibility.
Features:
· Ultimate lightweight and slim design for mobile usage, weighs only 0.5kg.
· Simple intuitive one-touch operation: No complicated options and settings, duplication starts immediately with just one touch operation.
· Fast copy mode for higher efficiency: Auto detect System and Files and only copy the data area.
· Supports 2.5 "and 3.5" hard disk drive and SSD
· Supports MBR and GPT partition format, unlimited capacity, and 4K advanced format hard disk drive
· Equipped with LED lights, work status at a glance
About ILY Enterprise, Inc.:
ILY Enterprise, Inc. has been a pioneer in developing and manufacturing Blu-ray/DVD/CD duplicator, USB/Flash Memory duplication system and portable duplication technologies since 1995.
ILY Enterprise, Inc. provides one-year warranty on all Spartan brand duplicator systems. All duplicators are proudly assembled and tested in City of Industry, California.
